Keywords: Imperial Guard , Ruler , Shi'ar
Real Name: D'Ken
Special Powers
MAJESTOR OF THE SHI'AR EMPIRE: Leadership, Mastermind. When D'Ken uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a XMRF #009 Shi'ar Soldier on click #1. // UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Shi'ar keyword that occupy or are adjacent to 1+ Shi'ar Flag light objects modify range +1.
TRAP YOU IN THE M'KRAAN CRYSTAL: POWER: Make a close attack targeting a single opposing character. Instead of normal damage, deal 1 penetrating damage and, until your next turn, the hit character has Immune, Immobile, and can't target D'Ken unless they are the only character on that force, even if this power is lost.
Trade D'Ken Want D'Ken

Comments
March 22, 2022
ODYNH
He is truly a steal for his point cost and if you manage to generate at least 2 soldiers he is almost immune via his mastermind. His stats are also very good for his first 4 clicks. A true Shia'r ruler.
August 29, 2021
hoojeebo
Pretty sure the last 2 clicks are meant to represent when he was in a coma after he tried to use the M'Kraan Crystal as a weapon, but was psychically defeated by Jean Grey. As part of the Rise & Fall storyline, Vulcan later revived him from the coma, only to kill him shortly thereafter.
August 12, 2021
Goop
Fun piece that can assist with generating the soldiers. I have no idea what is going on with those last 2 clicks or why you would want to do less damage to make a figure immune. The extra soldier generation is really the only reason to run him.
